CustomField.inlineHelpText: A 90% and above -Far exceed job requirements in all areas of work, making positive contributions in areas beyond immediate responsibility. B+ 85% to < 90% -Exceed job requirements in most areas of works B 80% to <85% -Exceed job requirements in most areas of works C 70% to < 80% -Exceed job requirements in some areas of work.Additional contributions are more than shortcomings. C+ 50% to < 70% -Meet Job requirements D < 50% -Not meeting job requirements
CustomField.label: Overall Performance Rating[W]:
